column4: stupid question: I have a 65GB ext3 partition. How come it only has 25GB free even though the total off all the contents is only 35.7GB?
it says size 64G, used 36G, free 25G - somehow that doesn't add up
no, my problem is that there's 3GB of unaccounted for data
I cant umount it
do you have libdvdcss installed
nop. I didnt use it
DVDs are encrypted, you need a decoder
I can read it (explore trough the dirs and that),but I want to get it out!! xDD
might I enquire why?
its cause I want to know absolutely everything that my girlfriend writes on my PC
I /clear ed the second you typed that, can you repeat?
if she has a firewall, it'll almost definitely find a software keylogger and then you'll be in trouble
in my computer I said...
this is IRC and FreeNode, you don't have a girlfriend :-p
err.... WHY?
'cause I like thunar more than nautilus
do you know how to do it?
he's root? graphically? ow..
yeap.
how'd he manage that (I assume he's a dumbass and not a linux nerd)?
what??
he enabled the root account
